title: Gathering Stones
marks: Signature, Title, Date, and Mark LRC: [Micah]; LLC, in blue-grey: [Gathering Stones
description: human figure dressed in blue, squatting in field with back to viewer, basket at PR side; autumnal landscape; river at LL, trees in background
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
